prompt: A modern, softly lit interior space with a subtle, pixelated gradient grid pattern on a wall, transitioning from mint green at the top to teal at the bottom. The environment is viewed straight-on, with natural daylight streaming in, and the overall atmosphere is calm and inviting. There are no text, screens, posters, or abstract elements—only real objects such as plants, furniture, and people casually interacting or relaxing in the space. The grid pattern appears as part of the wall decor, not overpowering, allowing for visual balance and variation in each scene.

Documentary-style photograph of a young professional woman smiling with calm confidence in a bright, naturally lit Scandinavian-inspired office. The environment features large windows, white walls, and light wood accents, with soft mint green and sky blue details subtly present in plants or accessories. The composition is medium-wide, with the subject off-center and environmental depth visible—foreground includes a clean desk with a notebook and coffee cup, background shows airy open space. Lighting is cool-natural (around 6000K), with soft, diffused highlights and desaturated neutral grays dominating the palette. The mood is focused optimism with a relaxed, authentic expression. No screens, text, or tech elements present. Generous negative space and architectural lines create a sense of openness and trust.

Documentary-style photograph of a diverse team of three people collaborating around a minimalist table in a bright, daylit co-working space with Scandinavian design. The group is engaged in discussion, using notebooks and pens, with relaxed body language and authentic interaction. The composition includes generous negative space and layered architectural depth—foreground may feature a coffee cup or plant, background reveals more of the open, inviting environment. Desaturated colors with neutral grays dominate; mood is collaborative, focused optimism. No tech, screens, or text present. Subjects are off-center, expressions are natural and candid, embodying fairness and transparency.
